function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shortage of goods in grocery retail stores","Impact":"Disruption in supply chain and consumer behavior","Mitigation":"Improve supply chain management and inventory forecasting","Technologies":"Inventory management systems, AI for demand forecasting","People":"Consumers, grocery retailers","Owner":"Supply chain managers, grocery retailers"},{"Description":"Encouraging new behaviors through government policies","Impact":"Increased reliance on online shopping and digital technologies","Mitigation":"Provide incentives for a diverse range of shopping behaviors, not limited to online shopping","Technologies":"Digital marketing, e-commerce platforms","People":"Consumers, retailers, government","Owner":"Government, retailers, marketing agencies"},{"Description":"Increase in online retailing due to social distancing measures and fear of infection","Impact":"Shift in consumer behavior and preference for online shopping","Mitigation":"Enhance online shopping experience, provide contactless delivery options","Technologies":"E-commerce platforms, contactless payment systems","People":"Consumers, online retailers","Owner":"Online retailers, technology providers"}]}
